name: Veggies4MyHeart
description:
Veggies4MyHeart is a mobile game developed in collaboration with ciTechCare from Instituto Politécnico de Leiria through an investigation scholarship from Challenges Accelerator, with the objective of teaching the benefits of vegetables to young children in a fun way.

The game is also available on PlayStore but as it is directed to Portuguese audicence it's only available on Portugal.

This game was developed by Tiago Duarte, Vanda Freire and Carlos Filipe as the final project for the bachelor degree in Digital Games and Multimedia @ IPLeiria
